markdownRemark.html: Bilingual kindergarten for young chidren from 1-5 years. situated in Atalaya Park, this kindergarten takes children from the ages of 1-5 and is open from 9-18hrs. Teaching is in both English and Spanish, either full or part time, and there are lots of after-school activities such as dance, judo and art.

frontmatter.title: Childrensplace Kindergarten
